Halifax Bank Uk
Department of International Transfer.
P O Box 548
Leeds
LS1 1WU, United Kingdom 
Phone: +44-701-704-6221

Attn: Leonard
Zeptowitz, 

Welcome to Halifax Bank UK (HALIFAX), We received an
instruction from the Company Board regarding your amount and also which
state that I Mr. Simon Fletcher, Officer in charge for Foreign transfer
and conversion from Halifax Bank, who will see you through the entire
process of transfer and conversion, as designated, i am the one whom
your funds is been handed over to enable smooth mobilization of the
funds. So you are requested to follow my instruction to enable quick and
easy transfer of the funds into your designated bank account in your
country,and also all relevant documents will be delivered to you
immediately the full fund has been transferred to your account.

We have
required certain details from you for verification and authentication
and we want your identification documents, You are to send the below:

*
PASSPORT SIZED PHOTOGRAPH:(FOR IDENTIFICATION)

We have required certain
details from you for verification and authentication, You are to confirm
that the above provided details are in your best of knowledge correct
and please CLICK HERE [1] , Also you are to fill the online transfer
form which has been attached to this mail.

NOTE: No amount will be
deducted from your entire remitted fund, due to the strict policy laid
down by the United Nation to effect the entire fund to your concerned
bank account in full.

Immediately the above document is received for
identification purpose, We will commence with the transfer immediately,
Please do avoid delay and respond back immediately.

Thank you for your
patronage.

Mr. Simon Fletcher
Foreign Transfer Manager
Halifax
Bank
United Kingdom
